title: Sampler, late 18th or early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, rococo, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Bridget Rule Mrs McConochie Mrs Hog
description: Building with four columns with thistle on each side and larger curving floral border at top.  Signature "Bridget Rule Mrs McConochie Mrs. Hog."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 18th or early 19th century.
late 18th or early 19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, rococo, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-85.
